sense.gloss: sixth month of the lunar calendar
around the clock, day and night
difficult, hard, troublesome, complicated, serious (disease, problem, etc.)
fussy, particular, fastidious, hard to please, displeased
six codes (constitution, civil code, criminal code, commercial code, code of civil procedure, code of criminal procedure)
gambling on whether the throw of a die will produce a "one" or a "six", gambling with dice
the five viscera and the six internal organs
inside one's body, in one's heart
the 36 (ancient Chinese military) strategies (of which the last resort was said to be beating a retreat)
rush of business, versatility, man who can do the work of many
race game (board game played with dice in which the object is to reach the end of a track)
ban-sugoroku, sugoroku, traditional Japanese board game similar to backgammon
night and day, all the time
competent in all fields, jack of all trades, very active in many fields, versatile, all-round, 8 faces and 6 arms

r_ele.r: ろっこんしょうじょう

sense.gloss: purification of the six roots of perception
six-three system of education (six years of elementary school, followed by three years of junior high school)

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑六↑↓ろく↓↑歳↑↓さい↓のときタイプライターの↑使↑↓つか↓い↑方↑↓かた↓を↑学↑↓まな↓び、↑手↑↓て↓で↑書↑↓か↓くことを↑学↑↓まな↓ぶ↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓などないと↑先生↑↓せんせい↓に↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: At the age of six he had learned to use the typewriter and told the teacher that he did not need to learn to write by hand.

sdata.j: ↑六↑↓ろく↓↑十↑↓じゅう↓の↑手習↑↓てなら↓い。
sdata.e: It is never too late to learn.

sdata.j: その↑急行↑↓きゅうこう↓は↑午後↑↓ごご↓↑六↑↓ろく↓↑時↑↓じ↓↑三十分↑↓さんじゅっぷん↓↑着↑↓ちゃく↓だ。
sdata.e: The express arrives at 6:30 p.m.

sdata.j: ↑雨期↑↓うき↓は↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓から↑始↑↓はじ↓まる。
sdata.e: The rainy season begins in June.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑秒↑↓びょう↓は↑一↑↓いち↓↑分↑↓ぶん↓の↑六↑↓ろく↓↑十↑↓じゅう↓↑分↑↓ぶん↓の↑一↑↓いち↓です。
sdata.e: A second is a sixtieth part of a minute.

sdata.j: ↑一般↑↓いっぱん↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑言↑↓い↓って、ここでは↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓にほとんど↑雨↑↓う↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓らない。
sdata.e: Generally speaking, there is little rain here in June.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓のただ↑六↑↓ろく↓↑十↑↓じゅう↓パーセントは↑大学↑↓だいがく↓に↑進↑↓すす↓む。
sdata.e: Only 40 percent of students go on to university.

sdata.j: その↑少年↑↓しょうねん↓を↑入↑↓い↓れて↑六↑↓ろく↓↑人↑↓にん↓↑招↑↓まね↓かれた。
sdata.e: Six were invited, including the boy.

sdata.j: その↑仕事↑↓しごと↓のおかげで↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑月↑↓つき↓に↑六↑↓ろく↓↑万↑↓まん↓↑円↑↓えん↓↑余分↑↓よぶん↓の↑収入↑↓しゅうにゅう↓がある。
sdata.e: That job brings him in an extra 60,000 yen a month.

sdata.j: その↑作↑↓つく↓り↑方↑↓かた↓の↑分量↑↓ぶんりょう↓は↑六↑↓ろく↓↑人↑↓にん↓↑分↑↓ぶん↓です。
sdata.e: The recipe serves six people.

sdata.j: そして↑次↑↓つぎ↓に、↑州↑↓しゅう↓についてですが、どんな↑州↑↓しゅう↓でもいいですから、その↑州↑↓しゅう↓が↑五↑↓いつ↓つか↑六↑↓むっ↓つの↑地域↑↓ちいき↓に↑分↑↓わ↓かれていると↑考↑↓かんが↓えてください。
sdata.e: And now, think about a county, any county, and imagine this county divided into five or six different areas.

sdata.j: さくらんぼは↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓か↑七月↑↓しちがつ↓に↑熟↑↓じゅく↓す。
sdata.e: Cherries are ripe in June or July.

sdata.j: このエレベーターは↑六↑↓ろく↓↑階↑↓かい↓より↑上↑↓うえ↓には↑行↑↓い↓けません。
sdata.e: This elevator does not go above the sixth floor.

sdata.j: くーっ、ビールが↑五臓六腑↑↓ごぞうろっぷ↓にしみわたる。やっぱり↑仕事↑↓しごと↓の↑後↑↓のち↓はビールだね。
sdata.e: Ahhh! Feel that beer seep into every fiber of my being. Yep, nothing beats a cold one after work.

sdata.j: きみは↑明日↑↓あした↓の↑朝↑↓あさ↓↑六↑↓ろく↓↑時↑↓じ↓にここへ↑来↑↓き↓さえすればよい。
sdata.e: You only have to be here at six tomorrow morning.

sdata.j: あなたの↑定期↑↓ていき↓↑購読↑↓こうどく↓↑予約↑↓よやく↓は↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓↑号↑↓ごう↓で↑切↑↓き↓れます。
sdata.e: Your subscription expires with the June issue.

sdata.j: ↑六↑↓ろく↓↑時↑↓じ↓↑頃↑↓ごろ↓↑車↑↓しゃ↓で↑迎↑↓むか↓えにきます。
sdata.e: I will pick you up around six.

sdata.j: ３↑人↑↓にん↓の↑看護↑↓かんご↓↑婦↑↓ふ↓が↑四六時中↑↓しろくじちゅう↓↑瀕死↑↓ひんし↓の↑大臣↑↓だいじん↓の↑看護↑↓かんご↓に↑当↑↓あ↓たった。
sdata.e: Three nurses attended the dying minister night and day.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑六↑↓ろく↓↑時↑↓じ↓に↑起↑↓お↓きますか。
sdata.e: Do you get up at six?

sdata.j: ↑今年↑↓ことし↓の↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓はあまり↑雨↑↓あめ↓の↑日↑↓ひ↓がなかった。
sdata.e: There were not many rainy days in June this year.

sdata.j: ↑妻↑↓つま↓に↑四↑↓よん↓↑六↑↓ろく↓↑時↑↓じ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓ぶつぶつ↑言↑↓い↓われるのには↑憂鬱↑↓ゆううつ↓になってしまう。
sdata.e: My wife's constant nagging is getting me down.

sdata.j: ↑昨年↑↓さくねん↓フィリッピンでは↑地震↑↓じしん↓や↑津波↑↓つなみ↓のために↑六↑↓ろく↓↑千↑↓せん↓↑人↑↓にん↓↑以上↑↓いじょう↓の↑死者↑↓ししゃ↓があった。
sdata.e: Last year in the Philippines, earthquakes and tidal waves resulted in the deaths of more than 6000 people.

sdata.j: ↑姉↑↓あね↓は↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓に↑出産↑↓しゅっさん↓の↑予定↑↓よてい↓です。
sdata.e: My sister is having a baby in June.

sdata.j: ↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓には↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑多↑↓おお↓い。
sdata.e: We have a lot of rain in June.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓は↑午後↑↓ごご↓↑六↑↓ろく↓↑時↑↓じ↓ちょうどに↑離陸↑↓りりく↓した。
sdata.e: Our plane took off exactly at 6 p.m.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑六↑↓ろく↓↑時↑↓じ↓に↑起↑↓お↓きることにしている。
sdata.e: I make it a rule to get up at six.

sdata.e: I make it a rule to get up at six.

sdata.e: I always get up at six.
